Healing

Repairing in Achron is not connected directly to Resources.

The hosts of restoration abilities are: SOP, Blackbird, MFB, Reaph, Foundation. SOP heals only biological, Blackbird only mechanical.

In-Battle Heal

The unit targeting prefers to attack healers first

Out of battle heal

MFB has bigger energy reserves than SOP or Blackbird which makes it better for longer term hp gain.

Transportation

All factions have access to a transport airship.

Ceso have teleports and slingshots that hasten relocating in space.

Vecgir can use self-teleporation to move around the map as well as slipgates

Status Recovery

The nasty status effects can be removed. Sepipod, Frigate and Teth Tercher have abilities to remove a wide range of status effects. Lancers and Shin Pulsers can remove Temporal Soliton Shield.


Ammo

Heavy Cruisers need to load nukes in order to use them

Reaphs need 50 to fire Plasma Cruise Missiles
